foods.ingredients: SUGAR, ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), PALM OIL, NATURAL PEPPERMINT, DARK COATING (SUGAR, FRACTIONATED PALM KERNEL OIL, COCOA POWDER [PROCESSED WITH ALKALI], SOY LECITHIN, NONFAT MILK POWDER, VANILLA), BUTTER (CREAM, [MILK]), HEAVY CREAM, COCOA (PROCESSED WITH ALKALI), SALT.

foods.description: PEPPERMINT CHOCOLATE MARSHMALLOW CONFECTIONS, PEPPERMINT CHOCOLATE
foods.lowercaseDescription: peppermint chocolate marshmallow confections, peppermint chocolate
foods.ingredients: SUGAR. TAPIOCA SYRUP. WATER. CHOCOLATE [CACAO BEANS. PURE CANE SUGAR. BUTTER. SUNFLOWER LECITHIN. VANILLA BEANS]. UNBLEACHED WHEAT FLOUR. BUTTER [CREAM (MILK). NATURAL FLAVOR]. DARK BROWN SUGAR [CANE SUGAR. MOLASSES]. COCOA POWDER. GELATIN. POTATO STARCH. PEPPERMINT EXTRACT [81-90% ALCOHOL. PEPPERMINT ESSENTIAL OIL, PEPPERMINT LEAF EXTRACT]. SALT. BAKING SODA
